colla.kernel.api

Interface CollAServer


  • public interface CollAServer
    Server management.
    Author:
    dmatos

        the port number to which server is listening

        Parameters:

        Returns:

        Returns:
        a set with the names of each client signed for the server.

        Updates a host data to the server
        Parameters:
        host - CollAHost to update

      • updateUser

        Inserts data from an user on the server, updating data for an existing client or entering data for a new one.

        usr - client to update

      • getGroup

        CollAGroup getGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
        Parameters:
        groupName - name of the group to be located.
        Returns:
        the group, if any, with the given name, or null if there is none.

      • getAllGroups

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllGroups()
        Returns:
        a set of names of all the groups registered in the server.

      • generateSessionID

        long generateSessionID()
        Generates an ID to identify an user session
        Returns:
        a long to identify the current session of an user

      • disconnectAllClients

        void disconnectAllClients()
        Changes the status of every client to offline.

      • getUserPassword

        java.lang.String getUserPassword(java.lang.String userName)
        Parameters:
        userName - name of the user
        Returns:
        the password of a client with the given name, or null if there is none.

      • generateTaskID

        java.lang.Long generateTaskID()
        Generates an ID to identify a task
        Returns:
        a long to identify a task

      • getMappedConnections

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.net.Socket> getMappedConnections()
        Returns:
        a Map of sockets connected to clients that may be either hosts or users. These connections must be kept alive in order to comunicate to those clients.
